title: Pixel to Pixel 5 Quick Switch without switching on Pixel
content:
Hi everyone.
I have been using the Pixel 1 for quite some time now and finally got my hands on the new Pixel 5 (Sage). 
My Pixel 1 has deteriorated so bad that the batter doesnt last more than 5 seconds. Therefore I am forced to use it with either a power source or a dedicated power bank 24 hours a day. 

I wanted to use the quick switch tool included in the new Pixel 5. However, I am not sure how I can use it with the old Pixel, given that it won't stay switched on without a power source. Would I be able to use the quick switch tool without switching on the Pixel?

thanks
S.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
